titleInfo.title: Pre-Columbian painted human figurine with applique features

mods.abstract: Pre-Columbian figure with large nose and narrowed eyes. Similar headdress to figure MS-022-06-F13. Only the right arm of the figure remains in a curled up position and looks to be holding an unknown object. Faded red paint in a linear style in some areas. Precise paint edges lead to the belief that these lines were painted in this way purposefully rather than being leftover from something that has already faded away.
Ok condition with several chips and breakage at the left arm and abdomen of the figure. The pigment is severely faded.

titleInfo.title: Pre-Columbian figurines
